visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly average temperatures for a year, with the series named 'Temperature'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the series and include settings for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The x-axis is labeled with the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. Both axes have styled labels and titles with specified colors and font sizes. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with the series named 'Temperature' and colored tomato red (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px.
